Class Castle

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Sprite
      • kingdom.Castle

  • public class Castle
extends Sprite
    Class that represents a castle

      • Castle

        public Castle(javafx.scene.layout.Pane layer,
              javafx.scene.image.Image image,
              Duke duke,
              double treasure,
              int nbPikemen,
              int nbKnight,
              int nbOnager,
              double x,
              double y,
              Popup popupOst)
        Construct a player castle
        Parameters:
        layer - Pane in which the castle must appear
        image - Image of the castle
        duke - Owner ( @see Duke)
        treasure - Treasurey
        nbPikemen - Number of spearmen
        nbKnight - Number of knight
        nbOnager - Number of onager
        x - Position x
        y - Position y
        popupOst - Popup to display for attacks or transfer
